name: Gift
description:
A game originally made over 3 days for LÖVE Jam 2018

Changelog v04 — minor additions and bug fixes

— Adds show-timer hotkey (f9)
— Adds return-to-menu hotkey (f10)
— Adds start-game hotkey to title screen (return)
— Fixes bug in collision detection

v03 — additional content and bug fixes

— Adds map updates and additional content after original ending
— Adds improvements to visuals and audio
— Adds settings menu and pause screen
— Fixes being able to initiate slide in midair
— Fixes being able to force keys through 1-tile-high gaps
— Fixes collision resolution issues

v02 — post-jam bug fixes

— Items dropped in water will now respawn at their last safe location
— Fixes map layout which resulted in softlock if certain routes were taken
— Fixes player falling through platform when respawning at checkpoint ↪
— Fixes crash when player picked up key dropped by despawned ghost ↪
